document.full_text: the n.l.r.b. told state officials it would file lawsuits against arizona and south dakota to block constitutional amendments that require secret ballots for unionization drives.
document.title: labor board plans to sue 2 states over union rules
lines_and_colors: the n.l.r.b. told state officials it would file lawsuits against arizona and south dakota to block constitutional amendments that require secret ballots for unionization drives.
